text.ascii: janamejaya uvAca
text.ur: janamejaya uvāca

text.ascii: kiM kRtaM karma dharmeNa yena zApam upeyivAn
text.ud: किं कृतं कर्म धर्मेण येन शापमुपेयिवान्
text.ur: kiṁ kr̥taṁ karma dharmeṇa yena śāpam upeyivān

text.ascii: kasya zApAc ca brahmarSe zUdrayonAv ajAyata
text.ur: kasya śāpāc ca brahmarṣe śūdrayonāv ajāyata

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: babhUva brAhmaNaH kaz cin mANDavya iti vizrutaH
text.ur: babhūva brāhmaṇaḥ kaś cin māṇḍavya iti viśrutaḥ

text.ascii: dhRtimAn sarvadharmajJaH satye tapasi ca sthitaH
text.ur: dhr̥timān sarvadharmajñaḥ satye tapasi ca sthitaḥ

text.ascii: sa AzramapadadvAri vRkSamUle mahAtapAH
text.ur: sa āśramapadadvāri vr̥kṣamūle mahātapāḥ

text.ascii: UrdhvabAhur mahAyogI tasthau maunavratAnvitaH
text.ur: ūrdhvabāhur mahāyogī tasthau maunavratānvitaḥ

text.ascii: tasya kAlena mahatA tasmiMs tapasi tiSThataH
text.ur: tasya kālena mahatā tasmiṁs tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ

text.ascii: tam AzramapadaM prAptA dasyavo loptrahAriNaH
text.ur: tam āśramapadaṁ prāptā dasyavo loptrahāriṇaḥ

text.ascii: anusAryamANA bahubhI rakSibhir bharatarSabha
text.ur: anusāryamāṇā bahubhī rakṣibhir bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: te tasyAvasathe loptraM nidadhuH kurusattama
text.ur: te tasyāvasathe loptraṁ nidadhuḥ kurusattama

text.ascii: nidhAya ca bhayAl lInAs tatraivAnvAgate bale
text.ur: nidhāya ca bhayāl līnās tatraivānvāgate bale

text.ascii: teSu lIneSv atho zIghraM tatas tad rakSiNAM balam
text.ur: teṣu līneṣv atho śīghraṁ tatas tad rakṣiṇāṁ balam

text.ascii: AjagAma tato 'pazyaMs tam RSiM taskarAnugAH
text.ur: ājagāma tato ’paśyaṁs tam r̥ṣiṁ taskarānugāḥ

text.ascii: tam apRcchaMs tato rAjaMs tathAvRttaM tapodhanam
text.ur: tam apr̥cchaṁs tato rājaṁs tathāvr̥ttaṁ tapodhanam

text.ascii: katareNa pathA yAtA dasyavo dvijasattama
text.ur: katareṇa pathā yātā dasyavo dvijasattama

text.ascii: tena gacchAmahe brahman pathA zIghrataraM vayam
text.ur: tena gacchāmahe brahman pathā śīghrataraṁ vayam

text.ascii: tathA tu rakSiNAM teSAM bruvatAM sa tapodhanaH
text.ud: तथा तु रक्षिणां तेषां ब्रुवतां स तपोधनः
text.ur: tathā tu rakṣiṇāṁ teṣāṁ bruvatāṁ sa tapodhanaḥ

text.ascii: na kiM cid vacanaM rAjann avadat sAdhv asAdhu vA
text.ur: na kiṁ cid vacanaṁ rājann avadat sādhv asādhu vā

text.ascii: tatas te rAjapuruSA vicinvAnAs tadAzramam
text.ur: tatas te rājapuruṣā vicinvānās tadāśramam

text.ascii: dadRzus tatra saMlInAMs tAMz corAn dravyam eva ca
text.ur: dadr̥śus tatra saṁlīnāṁs tāṁś corān dravyam eva ca

text.ascii: tataH zaGkA samabhavad rakSiNAM taM muniM prati
text.ud: ततः शङ्का समभवद्रक्षिणां तं मुनिं प्रति
text.ur: tataḥ śaṅkā samabhavad rakṣiṇāṁ taṁ muniṁ prati

text.ascii: saMyamyainaM tato rAjJe dasyUMz caiva nyavedayan
text.ur: saṁyamyainaṁ tato rājñe dasyūṁś caiva nyavedayan

text.ascii: taM rAjA saha taiz corair anvazAd vadhyatAm iti
text.ur: taṁ rājā saha taiś corair anvaśād vadhyatām iti

text.ascii: sa vadhyaghAtair ajJAtaH zUle proto mahAtapAH
text.ur: sa vadhyaghātair ajñātaḥ śūle proto mahātapāḥ

text.ascii: tatas te zUlam Aropya taM muniM rakSiNas tadA
text.ur: tatas te śūlam āropya taṁ muniṁ rakṣiṇas tadā

text.ascii: pratijagmur mahIpAlaM dhanAny AdAya tAny atha
text.ur: pratijagmur mahīpālaṁ dhanāny ādāya tāny atha

text.ascii: zUlasthaH sa tu dharmAtmA kAlena mahatA tataH
text.ud: शूलस्थः स तु धर्मात्मा कालेन महता ततः
text.ur: śūlasthaḥ sa tu dharmātmā kālena mahatā tataḥ

text.ascii: nirAhAro 'pi viprarSir maraNaM nAbhyupAgamat
text.ur: nirāhāro ’pi viprarṣir maraṇaṁ nābhyupāgamat

text.ascii: dhArayAm Asa ca prANAn RSIMz ca samupAnayat
text.ur: dhārayām āsa ca prāṇān r̥ṣīṁś ca samupānayat

text.ascii: zUlAgre tapyamAnena tapas tena mahAtmanA
text.ur: śūlāgre tapyamānena tapas tena mahātmanā

text.ascii: saMtApaM paramaM jagmur munayo 'tha paraMtapa
text.ur: saṁtāpaṁ paramaṁ jagmur munayo ’tha paraṁtapa

text.ascii: te rAtrau zakunA bhUtvA saMnyavartanta sarvataH
text.ud: ते रात्रौ शकुना भूत्वा संन्यवर्तन्त सर्वतः
text.ur: te rātrau śakunā bhūtvā saṁnyavartanta sarvataḥ

text.ascii: darzayanto yathAzakti tam apRcchan dvijottamam
text.ur: darśayanto yathāśakti tam apr̥cchan dvijottamam

text.ascii: zrotum icchAmahe brahman kiM pApaM kRtavAn asi
text.ur: śrotum icchāmahe brahman kiṁ pāpaṁ kr̥tavān asi

text.ascii: tataH sa munizArdUlas tAn uvAca tapodhanAn
text.ur: tataḥ sa muniśārdūlas tān uvāca tapodhanān

text.ascii: doSataH kaM gamiSyAmi na hi me 'nyo 'parAdhyati
text.ud: दोषतः कं गमिष्यामि न हि मेऽन्योऽपराध्यति
text.ur: doṣataḥ kaṁ gamiṣyāmi na hi me ’nyo ’parādhyati

text.ascii: rAjA ca tam RSiM zrutvA niSkramya saha mantribhiH
text.ud: राजा च तमृषिं श्रुत्वा निष्क्रम्य सह मन्त्रिभिः
text.ur: rājā ca tam r̥ṣiṁ śrutvā niṣkramya saha mantribhiḥ

text.ascii: prasAdayAm Asa tadA zUlastham RSisattamam
text.ur: prasādayām āsa tadā śūlastham r̥ṣisattamam

text.ascii: yan mayApakRtaM mohAd ajJAnAd RSisattama
text.ur: yan mayāpakr̥taṁ mohād ajñānād r̥ṣisattama

text.ascii: prasAdaye tvAM tatrAhaM na me tvaM kroddhum arhasi
text.ud: प्रसादये त्वां तत्राहं न मे त्वं क्रोद्धुमर्हसि
text.ur: prasādaye tvāṁ tatrāhaṁ na me tvaṁ kroddhum arhasi

text.ascii: evam uktas tato rAjJA prasAdam akaron muniH
text.ur: evam uktas tato rājñā prasādam akaron muniḥ

text.ascii: kRtaprasAdo rAjA taM tataH samavatArayat
text.ur: kr̥taprasādo rājā taṁ tataḥ samavatārayat

text.ascii: avatArya ca zUlAgrAt tac chUlaM nizcakarSa ha
text.ur: avatārya ca śūlāgrāt tac chūlaṁ niścakarṣa ha

text.ascii: azaknuvaMz ca niSkraSTuM zUlaM mUle sa cicchide
text.ud: अशक्नुवंश्च निष्क्रष्टुं शूलं मूले स चिच्छिदे
text.ur: aśaknuvaṁś ca niṣkraṣṭuṁ śūlaṁ mūle sa cicchide

text.ascii: sa tathAntargatenaiva zUlena vyacaran muniH
text.ur: sa tathāntargatenaiva śūlena vyacaran muniḥ

text.ascii: sa tena tapasA lokAn vijigye durlabhAn paraiH
text.ur: sa tena tapasā lokān vijigye durlabhān paraiḥ

text.ascii: aNImANDavya iti ca tato lokeSu kathyate
text.ud: अणीमाण्डव्य इति च ततो लोकेषु कथ्यते
text.ur: aṇīmāṇḍavya iti ca tato lokeṣu kathyate

text.ascii: sa gatvA sadanaM vipro dharmasya paramArthavit
text.ud: स गत्वा सदनं विप्रो धर्मस्य परमार्थवित्
text.ur: sa gatvā sadanaṁ vipro dharmasya paramārthavit

text.ascii: AsanasthaM tato dharmaM dRSTvopAlabhata prabhuH
text.ur: āsanasthaṁ tato dharmaṁ dr̥ṣṭvopālabhata prabhuḥ

text.ascii: kiM nu tad duSkRtaM karma mayA kRtam ajAnatA
text.ud: किं नु तद्दुष्कृतं कर्म मया कृतमजानता
text.ur: kiṁ nu tad duṣkr̥taṁ karma mayā kr̥tam ajānatā

text.ascii: yasyeyaM phalanirvRttir IdRzy AsAditA mayA
text.ur: yasyeyaṁ phalanirvr̥ttir īdr̥śy āsāditā mayā

text.ascii: zIghram AcakSva me tattvaM pazya me tapaso balam
text.ud: शीघ्रमाचक्ष्व मे तत्त्वं पश्य मे तपसो बलम्
text.ur: śīghram ācakṣva me tattvaṁ paśya me tapaso balam

text.ascii: dharma uvAca
text.ur: dharma uvāca

text.ascii: pataMgakAnAM puccheSu tvayeSIkA pravezitA
text.ur: pataṁgakānāṁ puccheṣu tvayeṣīkā praveśitā

text.ascii: karmaNas tasya te prAptaM phalam etat tapodhana
text.ur: karmaṇas tasya te prāptaṁ phalam etat tapodhana

text.ascii: aNImANDavya uvAca
text.ur: aṇīmāṇḍavya uvāca

text.ascii: alpe 'parAdhe vipulo mama daNDas tvayA kRtaH
text.ur: alpe ’parādhe vipulo mama daṇḍas tvayā kr̥taḥ

text.ascii: zUdrayonAv ato dharma mAnuSaH saMbhaviSyasi
text.ur: śūdrayonāv ato dharma mānuṣaḥ saṁbhaviṣyasi

text.ascii: maryAdAM sthApayAmy adya loke dharmaphalodayAm
text.ur: maryādāṁ sthāpayāmy adya loke dharmaphalodayām

text.ascii: A caturdazamAd varSAn na bhaviSyati pAtakam
text.ur: ā caturdaśamād varṣān na bhaviṣyati pātakam

text.ascii: pareNa kurvatAm evaM doSa eva bhaviSyati
text.ur: pareṇa kurvatām evaṁ doṣa eva bhaviṣyati

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: etena tv aparAdhena zApAt tasya mahAtmanaH
text.ur: etena tv aparādhena śāpāt tasya mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: dharmo vidurarUpeNa zUdrayonAv ajAyata
text.ur: dharmo vidurarūpeṇa śūdrayonāv ajāyata

text.ascii: dharme cArthe ca kuzalo lobhakrodhavivarjitaH
text.ur: dharme cārthe ca kuśalo lobhakrodhavivarjitaḥ

text.ascii: dIrghadarzI zamaparaH kurUNAM ca hite rataH
text.ud: दीर्घदर्शी शमपरः कुरूणां च हिते रतः
text.ur: dīrghadarśī śamaparaḥ kurūṇāṁ ca hite rataḥ
